name: Bora Bora or Bust
description:
Help Fred quit his menial job working in airport currency exchange where "his life is currency" and get him on a flight to Bora Bora!

Tweak the exchange rate to earn commission and use upgrades to draw in crowds and money!

Controls:
Left/Right - Adjust exchange rate
X - Open upgrades menu
Z - Continue/Buy Upgrades

Made by Josh Duffety-Wong from scratch for Ludum Dare 44.

Follow me on Twitter! https://twitter.com/DuffetyWong
